DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effectiveness paracervical block , lidocaine spray oral analgesic drug pain relief endometrial biopsy .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Paracervical Block Versus Lidocaine Spray During Endometrial Biopsy
DOC.detailed_description: Participants : This study conduct prospectively outpatient clinic , Department Obstetrics Gynecology , Songklanagarind Hospital . Inclusion criterion : The woman abnormal uterine bleed indication endometrial biopsy enrol . Exclusion criterion : include 1 ) contraindication NSAID Lidocaine - know sensitivity drug ; 2 ) pregnancy ; 3 ) genital tract infection ; 4 ) coagulation disorder ; 5 ) unstable vital sign . Sample size calculation : Sample size calculate assume different mean pain score group perform endometrial biopsy 1 . To evidence difference power 80 % 5 % level significance , need calculate 36 woman group total 108 woman . Z α/2 = Type I error ( alpha error ) α = 0.05 > > 1.96 Z β = Type II error ( beta error ) β = 0.2 > > 0.84 - Variance mean pain score procedure post procedure 15 minute = 1.5 µ0 = Mean pain score group 1 µ1 = Mean pain score group 2 µ0 - µ1 = Different mean pain score group = 1 **N = 2 ( 1.5 ) 2 ( 1.96 + 0.84 ) 2/ ( 1 ) 2 = 35.3 N = 36 per group Study procedures : 1 . Explain steps procedure patient counsel regard rational risks/benefits . Obtain consent procedure . Perform bimanual exam determine uterine size position . 2 . After sign write informed consent , woman randomly allocate 3 group . All woman receive Acetaminophen 500 mg Ibuprofen 400 mg procedure 30 minute . The first group receive paracervical block 1 % lidocaine 0.9 % NSS spray ( placebo ) , second group receive 10 % lidocaine spray paracervical block 0.9 % NSS ( placebo ) third group receive placebo paracervical block spray . Both woman researcher associate blind group allocation . The 1 % lidocaine , 10 % lidocaine spray placebo prepare sequentially number seal opaque envelops accord table random number independent pharmacist . 3 . The time start oral medication vital sign start procedure record . 4 . Starting procedure use large appropriate speculum maximum cervical exposure . Cleanse cervix povidone iodine . Then administer paracervical block use local anesthetic drug 5 ml . inject cervical area 3 9 O'clock , depth 0.5-1 cm. , 2.5 ml . side . After use anesthetic spray spray cervix 1 time wait 3 minute . 5 . Endometrial biopsy perform use 3-mm EndosamplerTM ( MedGyn EndosamplerTM , MedGyn Product Inc , IL , USA ) . If insertion EndosamplerTM fail , tenaculum apply anterior cervix help stabilization counter-traction . 6 . After get endometrial tissue sample , remove equipment , check stop bleed . And record vital sign finish procedure . 7 . The form contain visual analog scale woman report response pain immediately procedure 15 minute use Numerical Rating Scale ( NRS ) record . 8 . The woman assess adverse side effect complication procedure e.g . dizziness , nausea , vomit , pelvic pain others . 9 . Follow appointment woman pathological report result PSU hospital consider management . Expected outcome : To determine effectiveness paracervical block , lidocaine spray oral analgesic drug pain relief endometrial biopsy . Table . Pain score ( NRS ) immediately procedure 15 minute Group 1 ( 1 % Lidocaine ) Group 2 ( 10 % Lidocaine spray ) Control group ( Placebo ) Pain score immediately Pain score 15 minute A secondary goal study determine adverse effect method ( dizziness , nausea , vomit , pelvic pain , bleed ) . Data analysis : Data present median ( range ) quantitative variable frequency qualitative variable . Comparison group make use Chi-square test , Fisher 's exact test Mann-Whitney U test appropriate p < 0.05 consider statistically significant . Statistical analysis perform SPSS 17.0 package program ( Statistical Package Social Science ; SPSS Inc. , Chicago , IL , USA ) . Ethical consideration : - Inform consent obtain study procedure . - The study detrimental patient treatment outcome .
DOC.criteria: abnormal uterine bleed woman indicate endometrial biopsy 1. contraindication NSAID Lidocaine know sensitivity drug 2. pregnancy 3. genital tract infection 4. coagulation disorder 5. unstable vital sign .
